entries.femaleVariant: All right, mah people! We gotta close up for the day!
I'm lookin' for an Alex.
I'm V.
I'm V, by the way.
Alex.
[Show coin] Myers sent us.
Got orders from the president.
Wanna spend the rest of your life here?
Seven… Seven fucking years in this shithole. 'Cause o' you, Solomon Reed!
[Disarm Alex]
Hey, what the hell?!
Fuck this. Need a smoke.
Lemme try this. Gimme a minute.
You're gonna talk to her?
Fuck this. Need a smoke.
Should be fuckin' ashamed, Sol…
So, NUSA's tossin' us back into the fray, huh? New mission?
[Lean] FIA agent's missin' in Dogtown.
[Lean] Your real face what I'm lookin' at now?
I mean, what's the diff? Nobody who's anybody cares about "the real Alex."
Relax. Just wanna talk this through.
Understood.
The two of you close? Knew each other well?
Got it. Might tell us to go fuck ourselves.
Somethin' like that.
You and Alex – two of you were close?
I led our cell in NC, was her handler. She wound up stuck here in Dogtown post war, thinks it was 'cause I turned coat.
You're on the awfully short list of folks we just don't serve here.
So... she not here?
I'll have a gin-an'-tonic. Make it a double.
You've got some balls...
Sol ain't gettin' it, maybe you will…
President Myers sent us.
Get the fuck out!
Look, whatever happened between you two's none of my biz.
Hey, I get it. You 'n' Reed got some mutual 'splainin' to do, clearly…
Got a mission in Dogtown.
Got direct orders from the president. Right now, that's all you need to care about.
Have at it, then live out the rest o' your days in this musty armpit.
I cared. Cared for seven years. But now...?
'S all right. Take a moment.
That some kind of convoluted threat?
No, we actually need you, but maybe you need us more.
Someone's gotta. An' better me than you.
You, right now – 'm I lookin' at the real Alex?
FIA agent went missin'. Reed and I're tasked with findin' her.
And all of a sudden, FIA remembers I exist?
You know Dogtown better than than any other operative in their ranks.
"Their" ranks? So you're not FIA. Curious... what leverage they had on you.
Deal's a one-off thing for me.
Got conditions, though.
Monaco. Wanna burn rubber along the Riviera, drink champagne on a yacht with a fuckin' duchess.
Reed'll take you to Monte Carlo himself if that's what you want.
Preem. Go back inside, tell him I'm in.
Gonna need more nicotine 'fore I look at his face again.
Kept some shit from me, Reed.
So, heard you need someone to hold your hand, Reed, take you on a tour of NC's ass-wart.
I came to you 'cause I trust you, Alex…
If you say so. Fine, Songbird – heard we gotta sniff her out.
Then one day they nail your dick to the wall.
Fuck me…
Gonna take more'n one cig to process that.
Song's MIA in Dogtown.
Can't say if she’s alive.
You have someone in mind?
Wilky "Slider" Laguerre.
I shoulda figured…
Slider – care to fill me in?
Think this guy'll be willin' to help?
Renegade Voodoo Boy, murderer-turned-CI, all-around piece of shit.
Slider? Don't hold your breath. Classic repeat offender, no scruples or principles. Had to titty-twist him to work for us.
Outside the Net, he's blinder than three mice. Damaged occipital lobe – not even a Kiroshi could mend it.
Went rogue a while back, but I know where that little rat nests.
Let's pay him a visit.
Why haven't you collared him yet?
Claim Slider dropped off your radar, went rogue, but you know where he is…?
Why haven't you brought him in?
Oh, I dunno. Maybe I was savin' him for a rainy fuckin' day…?
Slider wasn't on my list of prios. Not like it's any of your biz.
So, we payin' him a visit?
Slider hides out in a would-be spa in Luxor Heights. Flick you exact coords in two secs.
What'll it be, honeypie?
[Sit] Beer.
[Sit] Soda, juice, whatev.
Take a cold beer, please.
No booze, thanks. Make it a NiCola?
Aaaand there y'are. Enjoy, honeybunch!
Hey, V, you at the bar?
Sure am. Waitin' for ya.
I'll be there momentarily. There's, uh, one thing you should know…
'Kay... What'd that be?
You know that op, seven years back, that went south. Myers left me for dead. Cover story was I sold out to Arasaka. I never told Alex it was a cover, so... things could get tense.
I'm nearin' the entrance…
NiCola it is.
You got it.
[Stand] Lemme talk to her.
So?
She's in – just wants a spy's nice retirement in return.
Didn't tell me the whole story, Reed. That’s twice now.
She still cares about you, about Songbird.
Don't we all...
Can you be sure?
V, the coin...
[Walk away] Thanks.
Thanks, Alex.
First time in here, I got that right…? Ya new to Dogtown?
Thanks.
Do you see what I'm drivin' at?
Like fuck you are.
Gimme one fuckin' reason not to, you shit-guzzlin' Arasaka traitor!
Alex...
Expect me to believe you? Just like that?
This op mean that much to you? 'Cause you're clearly hopin' to get somethin' out of it. Question is what.
Songbird.
Op orders came from the NUS pres, so… yeah.
But it's taken care of. She'll do it.
In exchange for...?
Wants a spy's retirement, someplace nice.
But if you ask me, she's itchin' to get closure after what went down 'tween you two.
Can't say I blame her.
Thought you'd know her better, having been her handler and all.
I just never thought she'd admit anything of the sort.
She'd gnaw her foot off to get the hell outta here.
Knowin' how stubborn she is, I don't doubt it.
That can be arranged.
Better be. Or she'll never trust you again.
So... all those years – where ya been? Involved with someone?
I was. For a time. It didn't pan out, though.
You?
You know me. No poor bastard woulda put up with me longer'n a month.
C'mon, stop pretendin' you woulda lasted any longer.
Got numerous hobbies – sue me. Speakin' of which... if I know you at all, you ain't dunkin' and swishin' balls anymore, am I right?
Only in my neck of the woods. You know how it is…
Yeah…
Surprised you didn't pack up, go home. Used to go on and on 'bout those fuckin' tacos…
I couldn't've gone home even if I'd wanted to. As to what kept me here? Musta been somethin'…
Which begs the question, Reed... what about me?
Why couldn't I go home?
The only way FIA agents left Night City was in body bags.
Not you.
No, no, there was a bag with my name on it, definitely.
Just dumb luck that I'm sittin' here in one piece.
You never believed in coincidence, still don't.
You're right, I don't.
Oh, hell no…
She's with me.
The hell was that? Did... did she just shape-shift?
Shapeshifting? What the hell?
[Sit] Nothing for now.
Nothin' just yet. Expectin' a friend.
Sure thing. But you lemme know if you change your mind.
[Sit] Surprise me.
Surprise me.
Adventurous. House special comin' up.
What's that?
Not here, is she?
Turn the fuck around and get out.
[Show coin] We're workin' for Myers.
Myers sent us. Got a mission in Dogtown.
With him?
FYI, seven years ago this scumbag stabbed everybody in the back.
No, seven years ago I was ordered to go to ground. And you were fed a cover story.
I had to take the fall. There was no other way.
[Show coin] Look familiar?
This look familiar?
"Tense," you said…
Metanthropic cloaking. Perks of the FIA-Militech connection – you get to call dibs on their latest-gen, cutting-edge tech.
"Could get tense," he said.
Yeah…
Yeah.
Yeah, 'fraid so.
Well, fire away. Serenade me.
What's it to you?
What if I do?
Then it's solely your problem. Now, 'bout the mission – spill.
Actually, it's personal.
Deal's just for this one op, then I'm out.
It's personal, got my own reasons.
Always starts the same way. Do 'em a favor, they promise one in return. Sometimes even deliver.
Sheesh. What's the issue?
She also banned from your bar?
Somethin' the matter?
She on that short list of peeps you don't serve here, too?
Story of a clusterfuck op. One that led to Reed disappearing and me bein' holed up here for seven years.
Here's the list of operatives – Reed, Songbird and me. Haven't heard this, have you?
That's just perfect... Tell me, you believe in coincidences? Or... fuck it – fate?
'Cause plug the same variables into an equation – and surprise! Gonna get the same fuckin' result. Shit in, shit out.
Well, you an' that hangdog Judas are in luck – 'cause I got a nasty habit of repeatin' the same gonk mistakes.
So what's your ask?
Want a spy's retirement.
Diplomatic posting in a warm, gobsmackingly gorgeous place where fruit off the trees is sweet and demand for field work is zero.
Think you can manage that?
Reed's sure to set it up.
Mission comes straight from the NUS pres.
Alex wants a spy's retirement sinecure.
Still cares about you, Alex does.
She's prepared to do anything to get outta here.
She didn't – not outright. Has just one condition – retirement, someplace nice.
Let a blind man escape?
How's an intel agency lose a blind man?
Holed himself up with Haitian buddies. Operates a large-scale tech and daemon mill.
We'll rendezvous there. Alex and I have some, uh... catching up to do.
We were linked, comms-like. Song ventured into cyberspace, then got attacked. She vanished just after. 'S all we know.
We need a netrunner. Kind who spends all their wakin' hours parsin' teraflops of data – might've caught somethin'.
Hah! Wouldn't count on brevity. Me? One and the same mission for the last seven fucking years.
Been workin' the local arms and tech dealers since the war. My "one op," that. Goin' real swell.
Well, I got a lot less time than that.
entries.maleVariant: Well, I got less time than that.

entries.femaleVariant: In this line of work, you'd fuckin' better. Had mine, too.
Ditch the Metroplex ghetto, cesspool of a life... Lo an' behold, FIA's offerin' next-gen chrome and a purpose. Didn't think twice.
Not unlike the fix I'm in...
After the same person – FIA and me.
FIA and me – we're after the same 'runner. Interests aligned, so you're lookin' at agent V now.
Survival. Woman we're after's offerin' somethin' that could help me. Just gotta find her first.
Survival.
And by coincidence, Myers also wants her? Who the hell is this bimbo?
Right. And the chairjock is...?
Ah, so you don't know…
Know what?
Never told you the whole story, did he?
What story?
Conditions – lemme hear 'em.
You're still an agent.
You in any position to have any? Still on their payroll.
Don't care. Tell Sol I'm done lettin' everyone walk all over me, expectin' me to lick their boots.
Way I see it, this is a favor I'm doin', a transaction. Want my back scratched in return.
Think Kabuki's home to Night City's soft-sorcerers? No. They're just there to push product.
See that tree there?
What about it?
Yeah. Somethin' special 'bout it?
Fitting, isn't it? How the prettiest thing here in Dogshit-town is a monument to the dead.
Still don't get this gonk affinity for symbols an' empty gestures.
When I see those two... Reed, Alex…
Empathy? From you?
Went through something similar myself…
Johnny Silverhand empathizing with total randos…?
Matter o' fact, they are. Had good reasons to fly the army coop.
See it clear as day. Any shred of friendship they've got left'll fizzle out. Not right now, but soon.
Friendship and duty –  not mutually exclusive.
Think. How many times you willin' to get burned 'fore you stop trustin' someone?
Replace “someone” with “country.” Or “corp.”
How many times you gotta take a bullet for these motherfuckers in the name of empty promises?
Chew on that when you look at those two.
People come here to commemorate the dead.
No columbarium in Dogtown, last I checked. People gotta have some place to pay their respects.
entries.maleVariant: No columbarium in Dogtown, last time I checked. People gotta have some place to pay their respects.

entries.femaleVariant: Problem with that is, the dead don't give a fuck about flowers and lit candles... They're fuckin' dead.
Somebody caught the grumpy bug this morning.
You’re just butthurt ‘cause nobody ever lit a candle for you.
Share a bond, those two. True friends.
Only thing they still have in common is their employer.
Got a bond, two of 'em. Took maybe four minutes and... they buried the hatchet.
entries.maleVariant: Got a bond, two of 'em. Took maybe... four minutes and they buried the hatchet.

entries.femaleVariant: After all the years, only thing Alex and Reed have in common is history and an employer.
entries.maleVariant: After all the years, only thing Alex and Reed have in common is a history and an employer.

entries.femaleVariant: Not mutually exclusive, friendship and duty.
Just sayin' that 'cause you never had real chooms.
Did too, durin' the war. Leavin' em' behind, goin' AWOL... Took balls, that.
Just saying that because you never had friends.
What's your point?
There a point to all this?
Couldn't mention this earlier? Sent me into a minefield.
Mentioning this sooner never entered your mind? Truly, Reed? Dammit…
I'm mentioning it now.
Get the fuck outta my sight. Both of you.
Could be anywhere, that one.
Song's MIA, prolly here in Dogtown.
First off, don't know that she's alive.
She could be anywhere for all we know…
Shit, maybe I am as sentimental as everyone else…
What could you possibly know about them?
What the hell could you possibly know about Reed, Alex – their relationship…?
Could've spilled the truth years ago, stayed chooms. But no – stubborn ol' Reed had his orders.
They're soldiers. Stick together no matter what.
They're fighting for a common cause.
They're soldiers – stick together through thick and thin. Unlike you.
Had a choice – run, or end up like my army chooms, face down in the mud.
They're fighting for a common cause, 's all the glue they need.
S what the powers that be want – for you to believe in some abstract bullshit 'stead of each other. System wins that way.
So, made up your mind?
Need another sec, sorry…
Takin' their sweet time, this friend o' yours…
If you want my advice, I'd dump that pile of human offal. See how he likes bein' alone.
Slider – who is this guy?
He'll help us?
Likely this time you'll just have to twist a little harder…
Sensin' somethin' stinky.
Sensin' there's legacy shit needs resolvin'…
Holy--
Yeah, maybe you're right… Anyway, better get goin'. Take care.
[Wait]
FIA agent went missin' in Dogtown.
This your real face?
[Sit]
Beer.
Soft drink.
Surprise me.
Nothing for now.
Chin up, sweetkins, seein' sunshine 'round the bend. Just don't you let those bastards walk over you.
Come on... you serious?
I ain’t goin’ fuckin’ anywhere!
[Drink and stand] I'll take this.
Right. Just don't gouge each other's eyes out. Need both of you alive 'n' healthy.
entries.maleVariant: Right. Just, uh, don't gouge each other's eyes out. Need both of you alive 'n' healthy.

entries.femaleVariant: Could spit in Reed’s drink if it'll make you feel any better.
Heh...
Couldn’t wait till I was done?
Bet you’d spit in Reed’s drink given the chance.
Want the coords?
Didn't get no honor guard, no commemorative plaque, but swore an oath before the president.
Swore an oath before the president herself.
Think that alone makes you one of us? Phh.
All right, special agent... What'd “the president” promise in return, huh?
Gotta know who I’m dealin' with here.
He'd know. Old dog, but senses – sharp as ever. Even spit wouldn't make it past 'em.
Ain’t got time for this.
Don’t really have time for your musings now, Johnny.
Gotta wonder why I even bother sometimes…
Right, Johnny. I’m outta here.
We’re getting nowhere here.
We’ll pick it up later. Time I was on my way.
[Drink]
You deserve a candle too, Johnny.
C'mon… Woulda lit one for you if I wasn't fresh out just now.
Hmm... Might have a point, Johnny.
Valid question, you might be right…
Everyone out! Now!
